May 17, 1997 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-second-section
Test Piece Contest
Confluence for Brass Band
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - flugal - Blaina. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
April 3, 2015, 9:37 a.m. June 30, 2020, 11:02 p.m.
1 Markham Main Colliery Band H. Jones
2 Blaina & District Bernard Williams
3 Treherbert & District Band Graham Sheppard
4 Newport Borough Band John Burns
5 Ebbw Vale Band William Cross
6 Pontypool Brass Robert Burnett
7 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
